inscription.text: 37. NIMCO Club 77 Express. Special Quality.Damp Proof 38. Fire Safety Match 39. Tarjhan (Hindi text). Sakthi Matchworks. Kalugumalai. 40.PRTO. 41. Tarzan Safety Match Deluxe (Front of number thirty nine. 42. Soda Chavi (Hindi text). Annai Match Factory. Kamanainckenpatti 43. Safety Matches. 44. Soda Chavi 45. TEKKA 46.House Boat. Rais Bros. 47. Bharat Tiger. Balamurugan Match Works. Venkatachalapuram. 49. Safety Matches. Rajendra Match Works. Sholapuram. 50. Deluxe Mavic 51. Super Raju (Hindi text) Safety Matches. 52. Mayur 53. (Back of Fifty two) Safety Matches. Resh Match Factory. Karuppur. 54. New Ship. Wimco. Carborised. 55. The Globe Match Works. Thonugal 56. Rasmico. @artist=Collector : Abhishek Khandelwal
